name: MancalaEffect
description:
Just straight up Mancala. Local multiplayer.

RULES

 Collect more stones in your goal to win!

Select a bowl to move all of its stones. Stones drop one by one, bowl by bowl, counter clockwise.

If the last stone you drop lands in your goal, you get an extra turn.

If the last stone you drop lands in an empty space on your side, and there are stones in your opponent's adjacent pit, you steal all the stones from the adjacent pit and collect them along with your last dropped stone.

Player A: Goal on left, pits on top.

Player B: Goal on right, pits on bottom.

Game resets automatically after a few seconds.

CONTROLS

Mouse: click on the desired bowl to start a turn.

CHANGELIST

28 May 2022 - v. 0.1.0  -  initial upload
31 May 2022 - v. 0.1.1 - game over and looping bug fixes
